## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G07020](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G07020)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SGT, UGT80A2</u>
- **Gene Name:** sterol glucosyltransferase, UDP-glucosyl transferase 80A2
- **Description:**   UDP-Glycosyltransferase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
